remarks: A closed walk expressed by properties of its components.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 24-Jun-2018.)
statement:
clwlkcomp.1 $e |- F = ( 1st ` W ) $.
clwlkcomp.2 $e |- P = ( 2nd ` W ) $.
clwlkcomp $p |- ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y /\ W e. ( S X. T ) ) -> ( W e. ( V ClWalks E ) <-> ( ( F e. Word dom E /\ P : ( 0 ... ( # ` F ) ) --> V ) /\ ( A. k e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` F ) ) ( E ` ( F ` k ) ) = { ( P ` k ) , ( P ` ( k + 1 ) ) } /\ ( P ` 0 ) = ( P ` ( # ` F ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d E k $.
$d F k $.
$d P k $.
